Package entity

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
entity.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Movie.

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int id, String title, String synopsis, String director, ArrayList<String> cast, ArrayList<String> genres, LocalDate releaseDate, LocalDate endDate, Enumerators.ContentRating contentRating, Enumerators.MovieType movieType)
      Creates a Movie with the given attributes. By default, a movie will have no reviews and no ticket sales on creation.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id for the movie.
      title - The name of the movie.
      synopsis - The summary of the movie.
      director - The director of the movie.
      cast - The cast members of the movie.
      genres - The genres of the movie.
      releaseDate - The release date of the movie.
      endDate - The end date of the movie.
      contentRating - The content rating of the movie.
      movieType - The type of movie.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string containing a brief description about this movie. String contains movie title, ID, release and end date, showing status, ticket sales and overall review rating.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      String containing a brief description about this movie.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares 2 Movie instances to check if they are identical.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      Returns true if all attributes of both movies are equal, else false.

      public void setAverageReviewRating()
      Calculates the average review rating for this movie. Average review rating is set to -1 if there are no reviews currently available.

    • getShowingStatus

      public Enumerators.ShowingStatus getShowingStatus()
      Queries the showing status of the movie. Showing status is automatically derived from movie's releaseDate, endDate and the current LocalDate from the system clock. Returns "END OF SHOWING" if current date is after movie end date, "NOW SHOWING" if current date is after release date and before end date, "PREVIEW" if current date is within 7 days before release date, "COMING SOON" if current date is more than 7 days before release date.
      Returns:
      Showing status of this movie.
